events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported problem has been categorized under refund due to customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! I’m Sarah. Sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help process your refund quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount back on your card within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and helpful solution. I appreciate the fast action on my refund request.
The refund has been processed and your case is now resolved. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
